bilingual.source: The poet talks about a ceremony from a different culture.
bilingual.target: 诗人谈论了来自不同文化的仪式。
仪式将在晚餐之前举行。
一位科普特人牧师主持了仪式。

bilingual.source: The ceremony was highly ritualistic, with many traditional elements.
bilingual.target: 这个仪式非常仪式性，包含了许多传统元素。

bilingual.source: They held a ceremony at the abb.
bilingual.target: 他们在修道院举行了一个仪式。

bilingual.source: He will recv the award at the ceremony.
bilingual.target: 他将在仪式上接收奖项。

bilingual.source: Please furl the flag after the ceremony.
bilingual.target: 仪式结束后请卷起旗帜。

bilingual.source: They will issue medals at the ceremony.
bilingual.target: 他们将在仪式上颁发奖牌。

list.abstract: ceremony是一个英语单词，中文释义是典礼；仪式，复数形式是ceremonies。
PENTAGON在2017年6月12日携迷你3辑《CEREMONY》回归，《CEREMONY》收录了由BTOB成员镒勋担任制作人的先行曲《Beautiful》、结合嘻哈与摇滚风格的主打歌《漂亮的要死 (예뻐죽겠네)》、献给Universe(PENTAGON 官方粉丝名)的《珍贵的约定 (소중한 약속)》、HUI的自创曲《谢谢 (고마워)》等七首作品，其他成员也都有参与词曲创作。

yingyinNormal.en: Because today is the grand opening ceremony for The Krusty Krab 2, where Mr. Krabs will announce the new manager.
yingyinNormal.zh: 因为今天就是克鲁斯 克莱伯餐馆二号的开幕仪式！仪式上，克莱伯先生将会宣布新的经理的名字。

yingyinNormal.en: You see, he's the Prince. Apparently they had some big ceremony before I was born.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他是个王子，显然，他们在我出生前有个大型仪式。

yingyinNormal.en: What's next, a commitment ceremony? Great. There's no room in your life for me anymore.
yingyinNormal.zh: 下一步是什么，承诺仪式？好吧，你的生活里已经没有我的位置了。

yingyinNormal.en: It's 2:00 a.m. What are you doing up? Nobel Prize acceptance ceremony streaming live from Stockholm.
yingyinNormal.zh: 凌晨两点钟，你还不睡在干嘛呢？从斯德哥尔摩直播的诺贝尔颁奖仪式。

yingyinNormal.en: It's gonna be great. There is a big ceremony and all the dads come and we pin on our badges.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那一定很棒，会举办一个大型的授章仪式，所有的爸爸都要出席为我们戴上徽章。

yingyinNormal.en: Great, well, who's it going to be? I'll do it, provided I can perform the ceremony in Klingon. No.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不错，那谁来当证婚人呢？我来吧，前提是得让用克林贡语主持仪式。没门儿。

yingyinNormal.en: We'll gather superheroes and leaders from all over the planet on our boat, the Everjust for a televised signing ceremony at sea.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们要聚集全世界的领导人和超级英雄上我们的永远公正号在海上举行直播签字仪式。

yingyinNormal.en: The Sorting Ceremony will begin momentarily.
yingyinNormal.zh: 再过一会儿就要开始了。

yingyinNormal.en: I mean you'd have the ceremony under this big beautiful arch.
yingyinNormal.zh: 应该在这个漂亮的拱门下证婚。

yingyinNormal.en: Wait a minute. She just made a scene in the middle of the ceremony.
yingyinNormal.zh: 她破坏了正在进行中的婚礼。

yingyinNormal.en: It's a shame you're joking. That'd be a lovely reading at our ceremony.
yingyinNormal.zh: 太遗憾你只是在挖苦了。不然本来很适合在我们婚礼朗诵呢。

yingyinNormal.en: You can put the aisle over here, and have the wedding ceremony right over here.
yingyinNormal.zh: 红毯可以铺在这边，然后在这边证婚。

yingyinNormal.en: How was school? Welcome, to the first ever in her life Maya refrigerator ceremony!
yingyinNormal.zh: 今天在学校怎么样啊？欢迎来到玛雅人生中第一个贴上冰箱的光荣时刻！

yingyinNormal.en: But he promised he'd come to my Explorers Ceremony to pin on my "Assisting the elderly badge".
yingyinNormal.zh: 不过他答应来参加我的探险颁奖礼，给我戴上 "帮助老人徽章"。

yingyinNormal.en: Yeah. Yeah, it's gonna be a small ceremony. Just family. His. Okay. Well, I'm really happy for you.
yingyinNormal.zh: 婚礼很简单，我们只邀请家人观礼，他的家人。好吧，我为你感到高兴。

yingyinNormal.en: So, we have the where and the when, but we still need to figure out who's going to do the ceremony.
yingyinNormal.zh: 地点和时间已经有了，就差婚礼的证婚人了。

yingyinNormal.en: Very well. And we will certify our dear friend James, with dignity. Give him a ceremony he deserves.
yingyinNormal.zh: 非常好，那么就让我们为亲爱的詹姆斯·威尔逊庄严送别，给予他应得的礼遇。

yingyinNormal.en: Anyway, I started working on what I'm going to say for the ceremony, do you wanna hear it? Okay. Yeah.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我已经写下我在婚礼要说的话，要听吗？好。

yingyinNormal.en: We're now in the ceremony, Monica is about to say, "I do" when her drunk uncle starts yelling. What do you do? Go.
yingyinNormal.zh: 婚礼举行到一半，莫妮卡正要说我愿意的时候，可是她的叔叔喝得烂醉，开始乱吼乱叫，你会怎么做？开始。

yingyinNormal.en: I think the marriage ceremony is about the same, but I have no idea how long the sacrificing of the straight men will take.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我想婚礼都大同小异，就是不知道直男愿意搭上多少时间。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 仪式的；礼仪的；正式的；礼仪性质的；无实权的

word_family.mean: n. 宗教庆典；礼仪；仪式；典礼；礼貌

examination_example.sentence: Write an email to all international experts on campus inviting them to attend the graduation <highlight>ceremony</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 给校园里所有的国际专家写一封邮件，邀请他们参加毕业典礼。

examination_example.sentence: In your email you should include time, place and other relevant information about the <highlight>ceremony</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在你的电子邮件中，你应该包括时间，地点和其他有关仪式的信息。

examination_example.sentence: Parts of the <highlight>ceremony</highlight> involve ritual hair cutting, tying cotton threads soaked in holy water around the bride's and groom's wrists.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 婚礼仪式包含剪发仪式、把圣水浸泡过的棉线系在新郎和新娘的手腕上。

sample.mean: n. 和声；和弦；和谐；一致；和睦；协调；统一；和声学；四福音书的对照统一文本；统一对照本
n. 祖传遗产；世袭财产；继承财产；继承物；遗产；教会的财产；教会的地产

examination_example.sentence_trans: 他参加了他的毕业典礼。

examination_example.sentence: Scott's car accident was on May 22nd, just three days before the <highlight>ceremony</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 斯科特的车祸发生在5月22日，就在典礼前三天。

examination_example.sentence: Why was Scott speechless at the graduation <highlight>ceremony</highlight>?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为什么斯科特在毕业典礼上说不出话来？

开幕式；开幕仪式；开幕典礼

examination_example.sentence: We usually have a flag-raising <highlight>ceremony</highlight> on Monday.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们通常在星期一举行升旗仪式。

examination_example.sentence: By the way, I’ll watch the opening <highlight>ceremony</highlight>.
Last month, a common graduation <highlight>ceremony</highlight> (毕业典礼) was held in Tianjin University.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 上个月，一个普通的毕业典礼在天津大学举行。
